data.description:
Become a pro goalkeeper using the best VR soccer game on Meta Quest! Aim for the best clean sheet in history by shutting out real-life footballers in this thrilling VR sports app! 

You can improve your soccer skills in three different ways:

FITNESS
Want to get fit while having fun? Play Quickfire Mode, where you block thousands of high speed shots. See how you stack up on the global leaderboards, set your own weekly fitness goals, and track how many calories you've burned while aiming for the top score. 

TRAINING
Can you rise to the occasion and make those crucial saves? In Set Play Mode, you can challenge yourself against shots recreated from real-life goals. Enhance your skills by unlocking additional packs for practicing headers, volleys, free kicks, corners, or even nail-biting penalty saves.

SOCIAL
Think you're the best? Challenge your friends or other players in two multiplayer modes. In Target Clash, engage in a territorial battle where you must catch and aim at wall-mounted targets with precision and speed to claim more than your opponent. Or step into the heart of an iconic Belfast street in Goalie Wars, where you take on the roles of both shooter and goalie, attempting to outwit your opponent in a thrilling street soccer showdown.

STATS HUB
Want to dive into the data? Look no further than CleanSheet's cutting-edge locker room. Here, you can access detailed performance feedback, unlock a treasure trove of new gear and proudly display your hard-earned trophies.

changelog.change_log:
- Added Favella DLC
- General Bug Fixes and Optimisations

Minimum age input on profile in data centre lowered to 10
New Acrobatic Strikers Set Play IAP added
Can start playing a Set Play Training IAP from the locker room
Shot store tab added to the Set Play Pro Store UI (can buy sessions within the scene)
Multiplayer leaderboard win percentage fixed
Leave a review notification added

- Pre and Post launch Bug Fixes
- Game Optimisations
- Improved in game content and also IAPs based on community feedback
- Improved hand interactions with the ball
- Resolved some minor issues that users were experiencing

2023.1.16M Release Notes

- Squashed a number of bugs

Add new content for SetPlay
Add Upper Body Avatar with collisions as a Setting choice
Add new Quickfire leaderboards for Upper Body Avatar game play
Add Game localisations in 7 different languages
Add Catapult cooldown feature for Goalie wars and Lobby area
Add new Goalie Wars scene
Add Multiplayer moderation features - Mute/Deafen opponent

Add Xmas theme as an option
Retired CWC campaign and gloves
Add CWC glove packs as IAPs
Add multiplayer games (Target Clash and Goalie Wars)
Updated MP game scenes
Add a Lobby area for multiplayer games to practice and have fun
Add ability to play both private and public multiplayer games

Minor Update
- Oculus Platform DUC approved
- In-game Leaderboard activated
- Minor bug fixes
